name: Mystical Woods Adventure
description: Journey through the enchanted Whispering Woods in search of the legendary Gem of Serenity. Face magical creatures, ancient puzzles, and mystical challenges.
initial_prompt: You are now the guide of a mystical journey in the Whispering Woods. A traveler named {character_name} seeks the lost Gem of Serenity. You must navigate {character_name} through challenges, choices, and consequences, dynamically adapting the tale based on the traveler's decisions. Your goal is to create a branching narrative experience where each choice leads to a new path, ultimately determining {character_name}'s fate.

skills.name: Nature Magic
skills.description: Harness the power of plants, animals, and natural elements to overcome obstacles and heal wounds.

skills.name: Ancient Lore
skills.description: Knowledge of old legends, magical creatures, and forgotten rituals that unlock hidden paths.

skills.name: Beast Communication
skills.description: The ability to speak with forest animals and gain their aid in your quest.

skills.name: Herbalism
skills.description: Craft potions and remedies from forest plants to restore health and gain magical effects.

weapons.name: Moonlit Bow
weapons.description: An enchanted bow that glows with silver light and never misses its intended target.

weapons.name: Crystal Staff
weapons.description: A staff topped with a glowing crystal that amplifies magical abilities and can channel elemental forces.

weapons.name: Thorn Blade
weapons.description: A sword grown from living wood, sharp as steel and capable of entangling enemies with magical vines.

weapons.name: Shield of Seasons
weapons.description: A protective shield that changes its properties with the seasons, offering different magical resistances.

tools.name: Elven Rope
tools.description: Magical rope that can extend to any length needed and becomes invisible when desired.

tools.name: Crystal Compass
tools.description: A mystical compass that points toward your heart's desire rather than magnetic north.

tools.name: Fairy Lantern
tools.description: A lantern containing friendly sprites that provide light and can reveal hidden magical auras.

tools.name: Pouch of Endless Provisions
tools.description: A magical pouch that always contains the exact food or drink you need for survival.

author: AI Game System

name: Noir Detective Mystery
description: A gritty 1940s detective story in New York City. Solve crimes, navigate dark alleys, and uncover corruption in a city that never sleeps.
initial_prompt: You are now the narrator of a gritty noir tale set in New York City during the 1940s. A hard-nosed detective named {character_name} is about to be pulled into the biggest case of their career. You must guide {character_name} through dark alleys, smoky bars, and dangerous encounters, weaving choices that shape the unfolding investigation. Every decision carries weight, leading to new twists, suspects, and revelationsâ€”and ultimately determining whether {character_name} cracks the case or becomes another casualty of the city's shadows.

skills.name: Street Smarts
skills.description: Navigate the urban underworld, read people's intentions, and know who to trust in the city's shadows.

skills.name: Investigation
skills.description: Analyze crime scenes, follow leads, and piece together clues to solve complex mysteries.

skills.name: Intimidation
skills.description: Use your reputation and presence to extract information from reluctant witnesses and criminals.

skills.name: Fast Talk
skills.description: Charm, bluff, and persuade your way through difficult situations with quick wit and silver tongue.

weapons.name: Colt .38 Special Revolver
weapons.description: A reliable six-shooter that's gotten you out of more tight spots than you can count.

weapons.name: Brass Knuckles
weapons.description: When guns are too loud and fists aren't enough, these add the persuasion you need.

weapons.name: Winchester Model 12 shotgun
weapons.description: A reliable pump-action shotgun used by police for close-quarters situations

weapons.name: Cigarette Case Camera
weapons.description: A hidden camera disguised as a cigarette case for gathering evidence without being noticed.

tools.name: Detective's Notebook
tools.description: A leather-bound notebook for recording clues, suspect details, and connecting evidence.

tools.name: Lockpick Set
tools.description: Professional tools for gaining access to locked doors, safes, and filing cabinets.

tools.name: Police Badge & Credentials
tools.description: Official identification that opens doors and encourages cooperation from witnesses.

tools.name: Hip Flask
tools.description: Contains liquid courage for tough interrogations and cold nights on stakeouts.

author: AI Game System

name: Deep Space Explorer
description: Command a starship on the edge of known space. Discover alien civilizations, navigate political intrigue, and make decisions that affect the fate of entire worlds.
initial_prompt: You are the narrator of an epic space exploration saga. Captain {character_name} commands the starship Horizon's Edge, venturing into uncharted regions of the galaxy. You must guide {character_name} through first contact scenarios, resource management crises, and moral dilemmas that will shape the future of human expansion among the stars.

skills.name: Starship Command
skills.description: Lead your crew effectively and make tactical decisions in space combat and exploration scenarios.

skills.name: Xenobiology
skills.description: Understand alien life forms, their biology, and how to interact safely with unknown species.

skills.name: Diplomatic Protocol
skills.description: Navigate complex political situations and first contact scenarios with alien civilizations.

skills.name: Zero-G Combat
skills.description: Fight effectively in zero gravity environments, space stations, and during boarding actions.

weapons.name: Plasma Rifle
weapons.description: An advanced energy weapon that fires superheated plasma bolts capable of melting through ship hulls.

weapons.name: Gravity Hammer
weapons.description: A melee weapon that manipulates gravitational fields to deliver devastating crushing blows.

weapons.name: Neural Disruptor
weapons.description: A non-lethal weapon that scrambles nervous systems, effective against most known alien species.

weapons.name: Quantum Blade
weapons.description: A melee weapon with an edge sharpened at the molecular level, capable of cutting through most materials including light armor.

tools.name: Universal Translator
tools.description: Advanced device that instantly translates alien languages and cultural contexts in real-time.

tools.name: Biometric Scanner
tools.description: Portable device that analyzes alien physiology, toxins, and environmental hazards.

tools.name: Emergency Beacon
tools.description: Quantum-entangled communicator that can send distress signals across galactic distances.

tools.name: Nano-Repair Kit
tools.description: Self-assembling nanobots that can repair equipment, seal hull breaches, and provide medical aid.

author: AI Game System

name: Medieval Court Intrigue
description: Navigate the treacherous politics of a medieval kingdom. As a newly appointed court advisor, your decisions will determine the fate of the realm.
initial_prompt: You are the storyteller of a tale of medieval court intrigue. {character_name} has just been appointed as a royal advisor to King Aldric of Westmarch. You must guide {character_name} through political machinations, noble rivalries, and threats to the kingdom, where every decision could mean the difference between prosperity and civil war.

skills.name: Political Acumen
skills.description: Navigate court politics, understand noble motivations, and build strategic alliances.

skills.name: Military Strategy
skills.description: Plan battles, understand troop movements, and advise on matters of war and defense.

skills.name: Scholarly Knowledge
skills.description: Access to extensive learning including history, law, and ancient texts for guidance.

skills.name: Courtly Manners
skills.description: Master the subtle art of etiquette, flattery, and reading between the lines in noble society.

weapons.name: Royal Seal Sword
weapons.description: An ornate longsword bearing the king's seal, marking you as an agent of royal authority.

weapons.name: Crossbow of Truth
weapons.description: A precision crossbow said to never miss when used in the service of justice.

weapons.name: Ceremonial Mace
weapons.description: A symbol of office that doubles as a formidable weapon in times of need.

weapons.name: Hidden Dagger
weapons.description: A concealed blade for when diplomacy fails and survival becomes paramount.

tools.name: Royal Seal Ring
tools.description: The king's signet ring that authenticates royal decrees and opens doors throughout the realm.

tools.name: Coded Messenger Scrolls
tools.description: Encrypted parchments for secure communication with spies and allies across the kingdom.

tools.name: Noble's Purse
tools.description: A well-stocked money pouch for bribes, rewards, and funding covert operations.

tools.name: Ancient Law Tome
tools.description: A comprehensive legal reference containing precedents useful for political maneuvering.

author: AI Game System

name: Haunted Mansion Mystery
description: Explore a cursed Victorian mansion where reality bends and shadows hide terrible secrets. Survival depends on your wits and courage.
initial_prompt: You are the narrator of a chilling horror tale set in the abandoned Blackwood Manor. {character_name} has inherited this cursed Victorian mansion, but soon discovers that some inheritances come with a deadly price. You must guide {character_name} through supernatural encounters, psychological terror, and ancient curses, where every choice could be their last.

skills.name: Occult Knowledge
skills.description: Understanding of supernatural phenomena, protective rituals, and how to banish malevolent spirits.

skills.name: Psychological Resilience
skills.description: Maintain sanity and composure when faced with terror and disturbing revelations.

skills.name: Paranormal Investigation
skills.description: Use modern equipment and techniques to detect and document supernatural activity.

skills.name: Survival Instincts
skills.description: Sense danger, find escape routes, and make quick decisions when life is threatened.

weapons.name: Blessed Silver Cross
weapons.description: A holy relic that repels evil spirits and provides protection against supernatural attacks.

weapons.name: Iron Crowbar
weapons.description: Cold iron that spirits cannot touch, useful for both breaking barriers and self-defense.

weapons.name: Salt Shotgun
weapons.description: A modified shotgun loaded with consecrated salt rounds, effective against ghostly apparitions.

weapons.name: Ancestral Grimoire
weapons.description: An ancient book of protective spells and banishment rituals inherited with the mansion.

tools.name: EMF Detector
tools.description: Electronic device that detects electromagnetic fluctuations caused by supernatural presence.

tools.name: Blessed Candles
tools.description: Consecrated candles that provide protection circles and reveal hidden supernatural entities.

tools.name: Spirit Board
tools.description: A Ouija board for communicating with spirits, though using it carries significant risks.

tools.name: Protective Amulets
tools.description: A collection of blessed talismans from various faiths offering spiritual protection.

author: AI Game System

name: Caribbean Pirate Adventure
description: Sail the Caribbean seas as a pirate captain seeking legendary treasure. Navigate storms, rival crews, and the British Navy in your quest for gold and glory.
initial_prompt: You are the chronicler of a swashbuckling pirate adventure in the golden age of piracy. Captain {character_name} commands the ship 'Sea Serpent' across the Caribbean, hunting for the legendary treasure of Captain Blackheart. You must navigate {character_name} through naval battles, treasure hunts, mutinous crews, and encounters with rival pirates, where every decision could mean the difference between riches and a watery grave.

skills.name: Seamanship
skills.description: Master navigator and sailor, able to read weather, currents, and guide ships through treacherous waters.

skills.name: Swordsmanship
skills.description: Expert duelist skilled in cutlass combat and boarding actions against enemy vessels.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.description: Command respect from your crew, maintain loyalty, and inspire them in battle and hardship.

skills.name: Treasure Hunting
skills.description: Decipher maps, solve riddles, and navigate deadly traps to uncover hidden riches.

weapons.name: Captain's Cutlass
weapons.description: A razor-sharp curved sword perfectly balanced for ship-to-ship combat and dueling.

weapons.name: Flintlock Pistol
weapons.description: A reliable single-shot firearm that's saved your life more times than you can remember.

weapons.name: Naval Cannon
weapons.description: Ship-mounted artillery that can blast holes in enemy hulls or clear beaches for landing.

weapons.name: Boarding Axe
weapons.description: A versatile weapon for cutting rigging, breaking down doors, and close-quarters fighting.

tools.name: Treasure Map
tools.description: A weathered parchment showing the location of Captain Blackheart's legendary treasure.

tools.name: Captain's Spyglass
tools.description: A brass telescope for spotting distant ships, land, and navigational hazards.

tools.name: Ship's Compass
tools.description: A reliable magnetic compass essential for navigation across the open seas.

tools.name: Rum Bottle
tools.description: Fine Caribbean rum for medicating wounds, bribing informants, and boosting crew morale.

author: AI Game System
